Text.Page:
Despite our best efforts, the wendigo problem is growing. If they want a fight, we'll give it to 'em.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:34#500#wendigo frostweavers}, {@LinkCreature:34#510#frostmages}, {@LinkCreature:34#610#ragers}, {@LinkCreature:34#600#crushers}, {@LinkCreature:34#700#battlemasters}, and {@LinkCreature:34#710#warlords}.

Report to Rodena when the deed is done.
A hard-won fight, <PCNAME>. Your blood is appreciated.
The wendigos refuse all entreaties and offers. They've forced our hand, as we must guide yours. Take the fight to them.
